# Read input
n, m = map(int, input().split())
votes = list(map(int, input().split()))

# Check if the most popular item has enough votes
if max(votes) >= (sum(votes) / (4.0 * m)):
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")

n, m = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
a.sort(reverse=True)

if a[m-1] >= sum(a)/(4*m):
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")

import sys
sys.setrecursionlimit(10**6)

n, m = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
a.sort(reverse=True)

if a[m-1] >= sum(a)/(4*m) and a[m-1] > 0:
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")


# Read input and convert to integers
n, k = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

# Check if the sum of the elements is divisible by k
print("YES" if sum(a) % k == 0 else "NO")
